description: Update a service type unit of measure quantity. Only provided flags are updated.
permissions: User must be an admin or have update permission on the quantified resource (Pundit policy for the quantifies record).
side_effects: Updates fields and/or relationships on the service type unit of measure quantity record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one field must be provided. --quantifies-type and --quantifies-id must be provided together when either is set. --service-type-unit-of-measure cannot be empty when provided. --material-type and --trailer-classification can be set to an empty string to clear the relationship. quantity, explicit_quantity, and calculated_quantity (server-managed) must be numeric between 0 and 50,000. Updates are a no-op when user_can_mutate is false. A service type unit of measure quantity must be unique by service type unit of measure and quantifies; if a material type is present, uniqueness also includes material type.

flags.name: --quantity
flags.validation: Must be between 0 and 50,000 when provided.

flags.name: --explicit-quantity
flags.validation: Must be between 0 and 50,000 when provided.

flags.name: --service-type-unit-of-measure
flags.description: Service type unit of measure ID

flags.name: --material-type
flags.validation: Set to empty string to clear the relationship.

flags.name: --trailer-classification
flags.validation: Set to empty string to clear the relationship.
